ability.name: To Stone!
ability.flavor: You channel the Primordial Chaos into blows that petrify your foe... literally.

effect.t1: 9 + M damage; M < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
effect.t2: 13 + M damage; M < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
effect.t3: 18 + M damage; M < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

effects.effect: While the target is slowed this way, any other effect that would make the target slowed instead makes them restrained by this ability. Additionally, a creature who fails the saving throw while restrained this way is petrified until they are given a supernatural cure or you choose to reverse the effect (no action required).
